title: Provide Number of R Packages by Library — lib_summary
Provide Number of R Packages by Library — lib_summary
text: sizes sizes libraries calculated. Default FALSE

title: Provide Number of R Packages by Library — lib_summary
Provide Number of R Packages by Library — lib_summary
code: lib_summary #> function (sizes = FALSE)  #> { #>     if (!is.logical(sizes)) { #>         stop("'Sizes' must be logical (TRUE or FALSE)") #>     } #>     pkg_df <- lib() #>     pkg_tbl <- table(pkg_df[, "LibPath"]) #>     pkg_df <- as.data.frame(pkg_tbl, stringsAsFactors = FALSE) #>     names(pkg_df) <- c("Library", "n_packages") #>     print(pkg_df) #>     if (isTRUE(sizes)) { #>         pkg_df <- calculate_sizes(pkg_df) #>     } #>     pkg_df #> } #> <bytecode: 0x55f544f32940> #> <environment: namespace:libminer>
